title: Retrieve additional information for a user's business details

businessId.description: A unique identifier for the business income source. Previously known as selfEmploymentId.

typeOfBusiness.description: The type of business income source.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

firstAccountingPeriodStartDate.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'retrieveAdditionalFields')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}The first accounting period start date. Note: Accounting period start and end dates should not be displayed to users of your software.

firstAccountingPeriodEndDate.description: {{#unless (releasedInProduction 'retrieveAdditionalFields')}}[Test only] {{/unless}}The first accounting period end date. Note: Accounting period start and end dates should not be displayed to users of your software.

latencyEndDate.description: End date of latency period for the income source.

taxYear1.description: First tax year for the income source.

taxYear2.description: Second tax year for the income source.

quarterlyPeriodType.description: The quarterly period type that is being chosen for the business ID.

taxYearOfChoice.description: The tax year for which the quarterly period type was chosen.

accountingPeriods.description: The start and end dates of the latest accounting period for the business. This array contains dates for the latest accounting period only. Note: Accounting period start and end dates should not be displayed to users of your software.

start.description: Date your books or accounts start - the beginning of your accounting period.

end.description: Date your books or accounts are made up to - the end of your accounting period.

accountingType.description: CASH if you used the cash basis, money actually received and paid out, to calculate your income and expenses. Otherwise ACCRUALS. This field is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Use the `Retrieve Accounting Type` endpoint available in version 2.0 instead.

commencementDate.description: Business start date, must be in the past.

businessAddressLineOne.description: First line of the business address.

businessAddressLineTwo.description: Second line of the business address.

businessAddressLineThree.description: Third line of the business address.

businessAddressLineFour.description: Fourth line of the business address.

businessAddressCountryCode.description: ISO country code for the business if it is in a non-GB country. The two-letter code for a country must adhere to ISO 3166.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description:
A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource
The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
